headline.main: DRIVE FOR MOSCOW SPEEDED BY NAZIS; Tanks Head for Smolensk as Bombers Batter Key Rail Point Beyond Minsk HUGE TRAP IS TIGHTENED Bialystok 'Pocket' Is Cut Up -- Leningrad Line Severed With Fall of Riga

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, July 1 -- Although reticent about specific geographical gains won by its attacking forces on the Russian front, the German High Command today claimed continued success in all sectors in spite of the "fanatic" resistance of the Red Army.
abstract: Germans in drive on Moscow; bomb Smolensk; call USSR resistance fanatic; claim gains in all sectors; aim to cut Leningrad-Odessa rail line; Germans claim 322 USSR planes downed; illus
snippet: BERLIN, July 1 -- Although reticent about specific geographical gains won by its attacking forces on the Russian front, the German High Command today claimed continued success in all sectors in spite of the "fanatic" resistance of the Red Army....

byline.original: By C. BROOKS PETERSBy Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
